results.name: Number of tilings of a 7 X n rectangle using straight (3 X 1) trominoes and 2 X 2 tiles.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
example: a(2) = 3, because there are 3 tilings of a 7 X 2 rectangle using straight (3 X 1) trominoes and 2 X 2 tiles:
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Dec 02 2012
